website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for children who feel they've outgrown cutesy character merchandise.
pros: Piano-lacquered ball with flashing LED lights
Can also play music with micro SD card and 3.5 mm audio cable

customer_reviews.title: Great futuristic looking speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is stylish and sounds great. I love the changing lights to set the ambience in my bedroom. I turn it on in the mornings & listen to music to help motivate me to get dressed for work. I can hear it clearly over my shower. Very nice sound quality and base.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy in awhile!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, great sound for the price, changing lights are cute but also can be turned off. Connects easily to Bluetooth, and easy to charge. Charging cable comes with the purchase. Best product I bought for awhile. Liked this modern, fashionable; yet sturdy speaker so much that I bought the same speaker 2 more times so that I have 1 speaker in each of my main rooms I used. I bought the colors white and black. Again, great buy and the prize is wonderful for this speaker!!
customer_reviews.author: G2G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a few weeks after return period. Plays ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working a few weeks after return period. Plays over bluetooth for s few seconds, then spontaneously stops. Will not restart unless I power cycle the speaker. This is with source and speaker within 2-3 feet of each other. Have tried multiple bluetooth sources with the same result. Absolute junk, avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Sraj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. Great as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone. I love that there’re different modes for the lighting styles. The speaker arrived very quickly with free shipping (without prime). The sound quality is great. I tested it out when I got it just to make sure it’s good so I can gift it to my friend. The volume can be quite loud but the sound quality is still very nice and clean :) I really like this speaker and I think it makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: What A Powerful Little Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a Christmas gift and boy were we surprised. While i didn’t expect the sound quality to be bad (based on reading other reviews) I didnt expect it to be that powerful considering its compact size. Great speaker with tons of easy to use functions and for a great price. We will be buying a few more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Always drops connection
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst speaker I ever bought. The sound quality is great actually. But it constantly CONSTANTLY just drops connection. And it's not my phone. I've had two phones since buying it and it drops connection on both. It's so frustrating! Bought a $5 speaker that works so much better. Sound quality isn't as good though. Just yourself the frustration and don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lazzzyangel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 11 y/o got this for her bday. She loves it easy to use and the sound is great. Easy to connect her phone to bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: VICKY  OWEN

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasted... which wasn't long. Probably about 6 months in and the buttons broke and fell into the base and even before that I had to keep the charging wire connected to the base at all times to keep the buttons in place correctly. Really disappointing bc it was really great sound and I loved how the lights changed to the beat of the song being played
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: configuration was easy, it's a great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: configuration was easy, it's a great little speaker. I wish I could turn it off the voice when Bluetooth connects etc - it's pretty annoying
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Has great sound for how tiny it is
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter so she can listen to Spotify from her phone in her room. Has great sound for how tiny it is. She loves the color modes.
customer_reviews.author: TD-CO

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as pictured and pairs quickly and easily to her bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister and she absolutely loves it! Looks exactly as pictured and pairs quickly and easily to her bluetooth devices. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Love this little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Has great sound quality and level. Love the color changing options. Seems to have a long charge life. Great for using all around the house from room to room. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: White speaker..
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker, great sound, very nice ambiance with the changing lights. I recommend this product. Love the white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: It sounds pretty good. I haven't read the manual yet on how to maybe turn off the lights, but they can be a bit distracting. There isn't much bass, but that's to be expected. Overall, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Pairs easily. Great lights! My daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a CD player
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I thought it had a CD player with it as it listed in the descriptive title. It does not play CDs, it is very small.
customer_reviews.author: amiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself and it's actually great for the price. Would have been nice if it had instructions on how to use it but figured it out by trial and error. They should add a feature that allows you to adjust the tremble and base.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Bought One for me, now buying two more
customer_reviews.text: Well I tried to buy this for me because I am a wife and a mom and I never do things for myself. So in order for me to enjoy the little things. I am now buying two more because my husband and teenage daughter are fighting over MY mini speaker. So yes this is a great speaker and it is very loud and works great with my IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: I initially had problems w/sync to Echo. I purchased this product for that exact reason. I eventually was able to make it sync, which it does automatically now. Also, first few days sounds great, but recently has had several occasions of static and dropping off. When it works, it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: tcarro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is an exceptional value for the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little speaker. Good sound for the price. Directions are lacking.

customer_reviews.title: Very much worth it & enjoyed by kids.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the volume could go up higher.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t like this. When using as a Bluetooth speaker it repeatedly tried to make a phone call through our iPhone. Really strange sound delay when playing a movie sound through the speaker. I am returning it.

customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought, but good as a secondary speaker. If you can set it up.

customer_reviews.title: I'd definitely recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the output of this little speaker. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone!

customer_reviews.text: Perfect speaker with excellent sound quality that is easy to use. The changing of the colored lights makes the speaker very modern and fun.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my partner. If you're buying for sound, 5/5. The sound is great for the price point. The lights are really fun, and there are multiple settings. The product doesn't seem super durable, and ours seemed to have a defect where the speaker cover was glued down. Doesn't seem like it's going to be an issue, though. For the price, I definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: It's sounds good but...
customer_reviews.text: The voice prompts I can't understand a word it's saying. The directions that come with the device are very hard to read they're so small. I ended up taking a picture of the directions using my phone and enlarging the instructions so I could read them. I attached the 2 pictures of the directions I took, in case anyone else has problems reading them. If you link this to echo dot you will lose the first part of the echo!s reply. As for playing music through it sounds great way better than I expected. Be careful how you hold the device when moving it. If you place your hands in the wrong place the device was shreak at you .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good but...
customer_reviews.text: It came just fine, just UPS had me pick it up. It works easily with my phone just not with the computer like I hoped. Since my songs actually do sound better though I will keep it.

The ability to charge and go is also great she loves to play or work in different areas of the house or outside, she can utilize this with ease.
customer_reviews.author: completed all levels. really enjoyed this app. skill and problem solving works well. recommend this app highly to get. look forward to the expansion

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is decent for a speaker of this ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is decent for a speaker of this size. However, the volume/controls are not printed clearly on top (so you don't really know which one is the volume or skip button). Also, if you disconnect it suddenly or press the volume to either max or lowest setting, it makes a really loud and obnoxious screeching sound.
customer_reviews.author: Tevina

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound and lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, and the lights are a fun addition, however, the top is a little weak and you must be careful that it doesn't get pushed on too hard as it bends. Purchased this as a gift for my 7 year old and she really enjoys jt.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, but didnt last
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift. It looks awesome and had great sound, but the speaker blew after a month. Didn't even play it at the highest volume.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers, confusing bluetooth call system
customer_reviews.text: The product shipment arrived a day after I ordered it so that was a pleasant surprise. As for the bluetooth pairing, it was relatively easy and instructions weren't really needed. The only trouble I have is figuring out how to manage my contacts because I was able to make an outgoing call from just the speakers alone. I thought I could only take incoming calls but who knows. I seem to enjoy the product so far, but I will update more if any difficulties pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works fine but I can't get two of them to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was right, it works fine but I can't get two of them to work together. Might be my low-tech abilities. It was easy to pair interesting look and it works with Alexa.

product_meta.title: Kids Night Light Bluetooth Speaker,Mini LED Portable Speaker Wireless Stereo Music Speaker,Built-in Mic and TF Card Slot,Compatible with Tablet PC Phone CD Player
product_meta.description:
Color:pink1.Why you must have one LED Bluetooth Speakers?

It is a pretty little ornament as it could make a warm and romantic atmosphere for you whether at relaxed coffee time, bed time, reading time, or take it along at any place, any time. The led light wireless speaker will definitely give you the best enjoyment.

It is also a wonderful Christmas or birthday's gift for your boy/girl/kids/family/friends .The cool classy look and color changing lights are very suitable for your families and they will be very happy and grateful. 

2.Necessary kinds of functions 

Hands-free callings: When your phone rings, the volume will automatically turn down and be replaced with an incoming call announcement.The built-in microphone is perfect if you want to chat without speaking directly into your smart phone.

Use as a bedside lamp: the lights not so bright, will not inflect your sleeping. You can also close the light if you don’t want any light. You could control the color mode according to your preferences. Each time the mode is changed, the shrieking cricket notifies you that the mode has been changed.

Micro SD card playing: a micro SD card port, enabling you to listen directly off your micro SD card.

Audio cable input playing: an audio out port for connectivity with devices that are not bluetooth enabled. Play your favorite music on your PCs,computers,phones,ect.

Warranty: All Wireless Bluetooth Speakers comply with 3 months return policy,12 months warranty, and response will reach you within 24 hours 

What’s in box
1*Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
1*3.5 mm Aux Cable
1*Micro USB cable
1*Instruction 

Warranty: All KIROBO WIRELESS Bluetooth Speakers are covered by a three-month no-quibble money-back guarantee and 12-month warranty.
Enjoy Freedom of Sound for an Active Lifestyle - Quantity
feature_bullets: ♬A Cute and Amazing Music Sound Bar♬ :Charming Bluetooth Laptop Speaker with piano bakes lacquer and LED flashing lights design, offering you a cheerful visual and touch feeling,it's also a elegant decoration for your computer/tablet desk or living room

♬ Adjustable Cool Breathing Colorfully Led Light ♬:Mini Wireless Speaker with 7 LED light flash colorfully, which makes you enjoy the music in a beautiful mood. And you can adjust the speed of light changes according to your preferences (Quickly changing colors,Gradually changing colors, Medium speed changing colors, Solid soft-white, Turn off the light)

♬【MUFTI-FUNCTIONAL, FAST CHARGING, LONG WORKING TIME】Computer speaker supports wired connection, TF card music play(Not including TF card) and Microphone. This speaker only charge 1.5 hours for one time, 6 hours using and more than 60 hours standby, support you the whole day power.

♬【A PERFECT XMAS BIRTHDAY GIFT &COMPATIBILITY 】A high-quality Wireless Speaker bar which is a real good gift for families friends, for Birthday, Valentine's Day and other festivals. Bluetooth 4.0 gives universal compatibility for Cellphones Tablet PC Kindle Fire and other device with Bluetooth. Instantly connect to your smart phone and use up to 40 feet away.
♬【What you get 】: 1x Bluetooth speaker, 1x USB cable, 1x user manual, 30-day money back guarantee, 12-month hassle-free warranty with friendly customer service.
